org.restsql.core.impl

Class SqlResourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restsql.core.impl.SqlResourceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SqlResource

    public class SqlResourceImpl
extends Object
implements SqlResource
    Represents a SQL Resource, a queryable and updatable database "view". Loads metadata on creation and caches it.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers
